channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Several road drains blocked near property, 29th October
item.description:
Several of the road drains are blocked outside the properties Poplar Villa, Stoneleigh and the Hedgerows on The Reddings. This caused minor flooding during the recent storms. The drains on this side of the road, two or three in each direction seem more blocked than others on the road. The photo attached shows the water level in the drain is still high even though it hasn't rained for over 24 hours.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Reddings, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Poor road markings, 29th October
item.description:
All along this stretch of the A38 form Tewkesbury to Gloucester the white lines are very poor. Driving in the pouring rain in the dark it was very difficult to see the white lines and the centre of the road, especially with dazzling oncoming traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Glass has caused flat tyre, 29th October
item.description:
Shattered glass outside 16 & 18 Regent Close has caused a flat tyre on my car. Please can the area be cleaned and am I eligible for compensation?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upton St. Leonards, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car has been left blocking my car on my driveway., 29th October
item.description:
Car left blocking the driveway of 3 Pintail Close. I have enquired with neighbours and no one knows. I believe it belong to a resident of 5 Rosebay Gardens. The one person in the house tells me no one who lives there is in currently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Rosebay Gardens, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic mirror has been disturbed, 29th October
item.description:
The traffic mirror outside the chemists in Winchcombe High Street (junction of High St and North St.) has been disturbed and is no longer of use to traffic emerging from North Street to see traffic coming from the right or for traffic turning left into North Street to see what is emerging. The mirror needs adjusting to its original position.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, High Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of broken glass, 29th October
item.description:
On both sides of Bath Road up here, opposite and by Jelly Armchair. Please could it be cleaned up? Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16-28, Bath Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No cycling signage defaced damaged missing, 28th October
item.description:
School lane from Bouncers Lane to Three Sisters Lane has defaced, damaged and missing ‘No Cycling’ signs for its full length. These all need replacing and the no cycling enforced.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finchcroft Lane, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead branch overhanging pavement, 28th October
item.description:
One of the trees on Gloucester Road has a large dead branch overhanging the pavement. When it falls, it would create an obstruction on the pavement or road and could cause injury. Please could you remove it safely? The tree is just next to the bus stop by Lansdown Close.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80, Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rattling manhole cover on B4633, 28th October
item.description:
The manhole cover on the B4633 Gloucester Road outside Domino's Pizza is loose and rattles every time a vehicle drives over it. Please could you look at this?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 262, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3x Street lights not working, 28th October
item.description:
Lights located at entrance to Caine Sqaure and Brosnan Drive not working. This is a repeat of continual failures on the same light units located at RHS approach to Caine Square/ Brosnan Drive corner, one at central T junction on approach to Caine Square and one immediately as you turn right into Brosnan Drive. Map location used for nearest available on App.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 27th October
item.description:
The stones out of a pothole are falling down the two drains opposite each other on Millham Road outside No.82. The stones are blocking the drains. Residents are worried this will cause flooding.
Report on FixMyStreet
